trans-unit.source: Contains policy assertions.
Use the PolicyAssertionCollection class to group together policy assertions and to enumerate or modify a group of assertions.
trans-unit.target: Använd klassen PolicyAssertionCollection till gruppen tillsammans principkontroller och för att räkna upp eller ändra en grupp av intyg.

trans-unit.source: The PolicyAssertionCollection is used most frequently as a return value for the methods of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> class.
trans-unit.target: PolicyAssertionCollection används oftast som ett returvärde för metoderna i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext>klassen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av den angivna <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The policy assertions the collection is to contain.
Returns a value that indicates whether the collection contains the specified policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om samlingen innehåller den angivna TransportBinding.

trans-unit.source: The name of the policy assertion.
The namespace of the policy assertion.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection contains the specified policy assertion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om samlingen innehåller den angivna TransportBinding; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified policy assertion.
The local name of the policy assertion.
The namespace of the policy assertion.
The specified policy assertion, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the assertion cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Den angivna TransportBinding eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om kontrollen inte kan hittas.

trans-unit.source: Returns all specified policy assertions.
The local name of the policy assertion.
The namespace of the policy assertion.
A collection of all policy assertions that match the specification, or an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: En samling med alla principkontroller som matchar specifikationen eller en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a specified policy assertion into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Infogar en angiven TransportBinding i samlingen med det angivna indexet.

trans-unit.source: The index at which to insert `item`.
The policy assertion to insert at `index`.
The assertion must not be null.
Removes the specified policy assertion from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort den angivna TransportBinding från samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the policy assertion.
The namespace of the policy assertion.
The policy assertion that was removed from the collection or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the policy assertion was not in the collection.
trans-unit.target: TransportBinding som togs bort från samlingen eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> om TransportBinding inte var i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Removes all policy assertions that match the specified name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort alla principkontroller som matchar det angivna namnet och namnområde.

trans-unit.source: The local name of the policy assertion.
The namespace of the policy assertion.
A collection of all removed policy assertions or an empty collection if no assertions were found that match the specified name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: En samling med alla borttagna principkontroller eller en tom samling om inga intyg hittas som matchar det angivna namnet och namnområde.

trans-unit.source: Replaces the policy assertion at a specified index with a specified policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: Ersätter TransportBinding vid ett specificerat index med en angiven TransportBinding.

trans-unit.source: The index that contains the assertion to replace.
trans-unit.target: Index som innehåller kontrollen att ersätta.

trans-unit.source: The policy assertion to replace the assertion already at `index`.
The assertion must not be null.
